field.label: Enable siproxd service
field.help: This will activate the siproxd service.

field.label: Inbound interface
field.help: Select the interface where your SIP requests come from.

field.label: Outbound interface
field.help: Select the interface where your SIP requests are going to.

field.label: Host outbound
field.help: Only use in a double nat scenario where SIP don't know your external public address.

field.label: SIP listen port
field.help: SIP port the service use, default of 5060 is perfectly fine.

field.label: RTP port low
field.help: Beginning of the port range RTP may use.

field.label: RTP port high
field.help: Ending of the port range RTP may use.

field.label: RTP DSCP
field.help: DSCP value to set for RTP packets.

field.label: SIP DSCP
field.help: DSCP value to set for SIP packets.

field.label: TCP timeout
field.help: Time in seconds when an inactive TCP session will be disconnected.

field.label: TCP connect timeout
field.help: Time in milli seconds siproxd should wait until the connection is established.

field.label: TCP keepalive
field.help: Time in seconds how often siproxd should send an empty Sip-Keep-Alive to hold the connection.
